prompts.title: Update Parcel Type Definition
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working with a React and TypeScript codebase. Your task is to update type definitions to ensure type safety across the application.

context.prdSummary: The Parcel type needs to include the new 'delivered_at' field to ensure type safety across the application.
relevantRepoConventions: File Naming: Uses camelCase for files and PascalCase for components.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The Parcel type needs to include the new 'delivered_at' field to ensure type safety across the application.

instructions: Add 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel interface.
Ensure the field is optional if not always present.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
deliverables: Modified src/types/parcel.ts with 'delivered_at' field added to Parcel type without TypeScript errors.

prompts.title: Modify Parcel API to Include 'Delivered At' Field

context.prdSummary: The API service must provide the 'delivered_at' data to populate the new column in the UI.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The API service must provide the 'delivered_at' data to populate the new column in the UI.

instructions: Update the API call to include 'delivered_at' in the response.
Ensure error handling is in place for missing data.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
Use existing API client for HTTP requests
deliverables: Modified src/services/parcelAPI.ts with 'delivered_at' field included in API response without errors.

prompts.title: Add 'Delivered At' Column to Parcels Table
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer focusing on UI development in a React and TypeScript codebase. Your task is to update the UI to display new data fields.

context.prdSummary: The UI needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column to users with appropriate sorting and filtering functionality.
relevantRepoConventions: Prefer Ant Design components for consistent UI patterns.
tokensOrConstraints: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
evidence: The UI needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column to users with appropriate sorting and filtering functionality.

instructions: Add 'Delivered At' column to the table.
Implement sorting functionality for the new column.
Ensure the column displays 'Not Delivered' when data is unavailable.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers
Use Ant Design components for table implementation
deliverables: Modified src/pages/Parcels.tsx with 'Delivered At' column visible and sortable in the Parcels table.
